20110102195645.000|20110102195646.000|CC1|AND OF HAVING THE EMPATHETIC    
20110102195646.000|20110102195649.000|CC1|FACTOR.                         
20110102195649.000|20110102195652.000|CC1|>> WE CAN PAY FOR EQUIPMENT THAT
20110102195652.000|20110102195656.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO USE ONE DAY A    
20110102195656.000|20110102195656.000|CC1|DECADE, LIKE THE SIXTH BIGGEST  
20110102195656.000|20110102195657.000|CC1|SNOW STORM IN NEW YORK CITY OR  
20110102195657.000|20110102195659.000|CC1|SUCK IT UP A FEW DAYS AND STAY  
20110102195659.000|20110102195701.000|CC1|INSIDE.                         
20110102195701.000|20110102195702.000|CC1|AND WATCH TELEVISION.           
20110102195702.000|20110102195703.000|CC1|SO, I THINK NEW YORKERS NEED TO 
20110102195703.000|20110102195703.000|CC1|JUST SUCK IT UP.                
20110102195703.000|20110102195704.000|CC1|YOU DON'T WANT TO PAY FOR THOSE 
20110102195704.000|20110102195706.000|CC1|SNOW SHOVELS.                   
20110102195706.000|20110102195711.000|CC1|>> COMING OUT --                
20110102195711.000|20110102195711.000|CC1|>> BROOKS TO NEW YORK.          
20110102195711.000|20110102195712.000|CC1|WHAT ABOUT THIS, THOUGH?        
20110102195712.000|20110102195715.000|CC1|LET'S TAKE IT BACK, E.J.        
20110102195715.000|20110102195717.000|CC1|1969, ANOTHER NEW YORK MAYOR    
20110102195717.000|20110102195718.000|CC1|RUNNING FOR RE-ELECTION, HAVING 
20110102195718.000|20110102195719.000|CC1|TO ACCOUNT FOR ANOTHER BIG      
20110102195719.000|20110102195721.000|CC1|STORM.                          
20110102195721.000|20110102195725.000|CC1|THIS IS JOHN LINDSAY IN 1969.   
20110102195725.000|20110102195727.000|CC1|>> I GUESSED WRONG ON THE       
20110102195727.000|20110102195727.000|CC1|WEATHER BEFORE THE CITY'S       
20110102195727.000|20110102195728.000|CC1|BIGGEST SNOWFALL LAST WINTER AND
20110102195728.000|20110102195730.000|CC1|THAT WAS A MISTAKE, BUT I PUT   
20110102195730.000|20110102195731.000|CC1|6,000 MORE COPS ON THE STREETS  
20110102195731.000|20110102195736.000|CC1|AND THAT WAS NO MISTAKE.        
20110102195736.000|20110102195738.000|CC1|THE THINGS THAT GO WRONG ARE    
20110102195738.000|20110102195739.000|CC1|WHAT MAKE THIS THE SECOND       
20110102195739.000|20110102195742.000|CC1|TOUGHEST JOB IN AMERICA.        
20110102195742.000|20110102195744.000|CC1|BUT THE THINGS THAT GO RIGHT ARE
20110102195744.000|20110102195745.000|CC1|WHAT MAKE ME WANT IT.           
20110102195745.000|20110102195747.000|CC1|>> HOW ABOUT THAT?              
20110102195747.000|20110102195748.000|CC1|>> IT IS ONE OF THE GREATEST ADS
20110102195748.000|20110102195749.000|CC1|IN AMERICAN HISTORY, BECAUSE IT 
20110102195749.000|20110102195752.000|CC1|BEGAN -- DAVID GARTH, THE LATE  
20110102195752.000|20110102195754.000|CC1|DAVID GARTH IS THE GUY WHO MADE 
20110102195754.000|20110102195755.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110102195755.000|20110102195756.000|CC1|IT WAS A POLITICIAN BEING SMART 
20110102195756.000|20110102195759.000|CC1|AND HUMBLE ENOUGH TO SAY, ALL   
20110102195759.000|20110102195800.000|CC1|RIGHT, THERE IS NO WAY I WILL   
20110102195800.000|20110102195802.000|CC1|EVER SPIN MY WAY OUT OF THIS    
20110102195802.000|20110102195803.000|CC1|MISTAKE.                        
20110102195803.000|20110102195804.000|CC1|SO, I'M GOING TO ADMIT IT.      
20110102195804.000|20110102195805.000|CC1|AND THEN TRY TO FOCUS PEOPLE'S  
20110102195805.000|20110102195807.000|CC1|ATTENTION ELSEWHERE.            
20110102195807.000|20110102195808.000|CC1|BUT, YOU KNOW, ON SNOW, WE HAD  
20110102195808.000|20110102195809.000|CC1|AN ABSTRACT ARGUMENT ABOUT      
20110102195809.000|20110102195809.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT.                     
20110102195809.000|20110102195811.000|CC1|I THINK GOVERNMENT IS MUCH MORE 
20110102195811.000|20110102195812.000|CC1|IMPORTANT TO THE ECONOMIC GROWTH
20110102195812.000|20110102195814.000|CC1|THAN SENATOR TOOMEY DOES, BUT WE
20110102195814.000|20110102195815.000|CC1|EXPECT GOVERNMENT TO DO CERTAIN 
20110102195815.000|20110102195817.000|CC1|BASIC THINGS RIGHT.             
20110102195817.000|20110102195823.000|CC1|AND I THINK THAT MAYOR BLOOMBERG
20110102195823.000|20110102195823.000|CC1|MADE A MISTAKE BY, ON THE FIRST 
20110102195823.000|20110102195824.000|CC1|DAY, WHEN HE KNEW IT WAS A MESS 
20110102195824.000|20110102195825.000|CC1|OUT THERE AND I WAS STUCK IN THE
20110102195825.000|20110102195826.000|CC1|SNOW.                           
20110102195826.000|20110102195827.000|CC1|I WAS VISITING MY FAMILY IN NEW 
20110102195827.000|20110102195828.000|CC1|YORK.                           
20110102195828.000|20110102195829.000|CC1|AND THERE WAS AN ACCESS LANE TO 
20110102195829.000|20110102195830.000|CC1|THE BELT PARKWAY THAT LOOKED    
20110102195830.000|20110102195830.000|CC1|LIKE A COUNTRY LANE IN VERMONT, 
20110102195830.000|20110102195831.000|CC1|WHICH IS VERY PRETTY, BUT IT WAS
20110102195831.000|20110102195832.000|CC1|HARD TO DRIVE ON.               
20110102195832.000|20110102195833.000|CC1|YOU DON'T JUST SORT OF GO OUT   
20110102195833.000|20110102195837.000|CC1|AND TELL PEOPLE TO SUCK IT UP.  
20110102195837.000|20110102195838.000|CC1|YOU SAY I'M TRYING TO GET THE

20110102195848.000|20110102195849.000|CC1|>> ACCORDING TO MAYOR BLOOMBERG,

20110102195853.000|20110102195857.000|CC1|DO WE REALLY WANT TO TRUST THEM

20110102195859.000|20110102195901.000|CC1|>> HOW ABOUT GOVERNOR RENDELL,  
20110102195901.000|20110102195906.000|CC1|HE PUT THE SNOW OUT THERE AND   
20110102195906.000|20110102195907.000|CC1|YOU SEE, EMPTIES THE BUCKET,    
20110102195907.000|20110102195913.000|CC1|THIS SEAT RESERVED FOR          
20110102195913.000|20110102195914.000|CC1|NONWUSSIES.                     
20110102195914.000|20110102195915.000|CC1|HE SAYS WE'RE BECOMING A NATION 
20110102195915.000|20110102195916.000|CC1|OF WUSSIES BECAUSE OF THE SNOW. 
20110102195916.000|20110102195919.000|CC1|I'M FROM LOS ANGELES.           
20110102195919.000|20110102195920.000|CC1|I DON'T EVEN UNDERSTAND THE     
20110102195920.000|20110102195920.000|CC1|SNOWFALL.                       
20110102195920.000|20110102195921.000|CC1|WE'LL LEAVE IT THERE.           
20110102195921.000|20110102195923.000|CC1|THANKS TO ALL OF YOU.

20110102195925.000|20110102195927.000|CC1|NEW YEAR HERE.
